trans-unit.source: To run matching based on the rules in the current matching method.

seg-source.mrk: To run matching based on the rules in the current matching method.

target.mrk: 根据当前匹配方法中的规则运行匹配。

trans-unit.source: Choose the button to run auto match for your specified leading unit and partner units based on the method. During the matching run, the <uicontrol>Assign</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Communicate</uicontrol>, and <uicontrol>Auto-Match</uicontrol> buttons are grayed out. This is to prevent concurrent activities on the same data set and to avoid any data inconsistency. Upon completion of the matching, the buttons are enabled again, and data refreshed.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the button to run auto match for your specified leading unit and partner units based on the method.
During the matching run, the <uicontrol>Assign</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Communicate</uicontrol>, and <uicontrol>Auto-Match</uicontrol> buttons are grayed out.
This is to prevent concurrent activities on the same data set and to avoid any data inconsistency.
Upon completion of the matching, the buttons are enabled again, and data refreshed.

target.mrk: 选择按钮，根据此方法针对指定主要单元和合作伙伴单元运行自动匹配。
匹配运行期间，<uicontrol>分配</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>通信</uicontrol>和<uicontrol>自动匹配</uicontrol>按钮呈灰显状态。
这样是为了防止同一数据集上存在并发操作，并避免存在任何数据不一致。
完成匹配后，会再次启用按钮并刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: For any existing assignment that has the reason code <uicontrol>Temporary Resolution</uicontrol> checkbox selected, the matching run unassigns and invalidates the assignment number, reads and rematches the latest data from the relevant data sources, refreshes the processing status, and triggers any follow-ups required by the reason code. However, if the assignment is still in the process of automatic adjustment or approval workflow, the auto match run skips it.

seg-source.mrk: For any existing assignment that has the reason code <uicontrol>Temporary Resolution</uicontrol> checkbox selected, the matching run unassigns and invalidates the assignment number, reads and rematches the latest data from the relevant data sources, refreshes the processing status, and triggers any follow-ups required by the reason code.
However, if the assignment is still in the process of automatic adjustment or approval workflow, the auto match run skips it.

target.mrk: 对于选中原因代码<uicontrol>临时解决</uicontrol>复选框的现有分配，匹配运行会取消分配分配编号并使其无效、读取并重新匹配相关数据源中的最新数据、刷新处理状态并触发原因代码所需的任何后续操作。
但是，如果分配仍在进行自动调整或审批工作流，那么自动匹配运行会跳过分配。
